text: He paigambara! (Aphno anuyayiharula'i bhanidinus) jaba timile aphno svasniharula'i talaka dina cahanchau ta uniharuko iddatako prarambhama talaka de'u, ra iddatala'i ganne gara, ra allahasita, jo timro palanakarta ho, dara. Uniharula'i uniharuko gharaharubata nanikala ra na uniharu svayam niskun. Ho, yadi tiniharule khulla vyabhicara garin ta kura beglai cha. Ra yi allahad'dhara nirdharita simaharu hun. Ra jo allahaka simaharubhanda agadi badhnecha, tyasale aphumathi nai atyacara garnecha. Timila'i thaha chaina, kadacita yasa pascata allahale kunai nayam avasthako srjana garide'os
